title: Catalytic pathways for efficient ammonia-to-hydrogen conversion towards a sustainable energy future
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01029A, Review Article
Mohammad Usman, Ahsan Ali, Zain H. Yamani, M. Nasiruzzaman Shaikh
This review describes the recent development of the catalytic generation of hydrogen from ammonia for the sustainable development of the hydrogen economy.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
